short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabAssistant - New Tab To-Do and Task List Extension for Chrome – your ultimate productivity and a personalized browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabAssistant - New Tab To-Do and Task List Extension for Chrome – your go-to for ultimate productivity and a personalised browsing experience.
More than a task tracker: this extension offers real-time weather forecasts, easy access to favorite websites, and customisable themes with a variety of backgrounds. 
Streamline your tasks, stay informed about the weather, and enjoy a uniquely tailored browsing environment, all in one convenient new tab.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the TabAssistant extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
The TabAssistant extension replaces your New Tab search engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://tab-assistant.com/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://tab-assistant.com/pages/policy

For more information please visit: https://tab-assistant.com
Enjoy and please don't forget to  leave us a 5 start review!
